scenario.name: Basic UAS responder
scenario.send:
SIP/2.0 200 OK ${last_Via} ${last_From} ${last_To} ${last_Call_ID} ${last_CSeq} Contact: ${last_Contact} Content-Type: application/sdp Date: Thu, 11 Feb 2016 20:03:47 GMT Server: Cisco-CP8941/9.4.2 Allow: ACK,BYE,CANCEL,INVITE,NOTIFY,OPTIONS,REFER,REGISTER,UPDATE,SUBSCRIBE,INFO Remote-Party-ID: "1008" <sip:1008@10.3.36.135>;party=calling;id-type=subscriber;privacy=off;screen=yes Supported: replaces,join,sdp-anat,norefersub,resource-priority,extended-refer,X-cisco-callinfo,X-cisco-serviceuri,X-cisco-escapecodes,X-cisco-service-control,X-cisco-srtp-fallback,X-cisco-monrec,X-cisco-config,X-cisco-sis-7.0.0,X-cisco-xsi-8.5.1 Allow-Events: kpml,dialog Recv-Info: conference Recv-Info: x-cisco-conference RTP-RxStat: Dur=10,Pkt=535,Oct=85600,LatePkt=0,LostPkt=0,AvgJit=0,VQMetrics="MLQK=4.5000;MLQKav=4.5000;MLQKmn=4.5000;MLQKmx=4.5000;MLQKvr=0.95;CCR=0.0000;ICR=0.0000;ICRmx=0.0000;CS=0;SCS=0" RTP-TxStat: Dur=10,Pkt=532,Oct=85120 Content-Length: ${len} Content-Disposition: session;handling=optional
v=0 o=Cisco-SIPUA 4741 1 IN IP4 ${local_ip} s=SIP Call b=AS:2000 t=0 0 m=audio 41978 RTP/AVP 9 101 c=IN IP4 ${local_ip} a=rtpmap:9 G722/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-15 a=inactive
